message: Fixed a bug that made our code do the Macarena when it should have been salsa dancing.
Updated comments to make them laugh out loud funny. (Disclaimer: I cannot be held responsible for any uncontrollable laughter induced by reading my comments).
Implemented a feature so cool, it has its own fan club now.
Replaced all instances of 'magic numbers' with 'unicorn numbers' for increased code whimsy.
Refactored spaghetti code into linguine code - it's still pasta, but at least it's easier to untangle.
Removed a line of code that was so unnecessary, it was basically the appendix of our program.
Fixed a typo that was causing the code to call the wrong functions. Turns out, 'duck' and 'duct' are not interchangeable, who knew?
Added a '404 Not Found' page to our documentation for anyone who's lost in the code jungle.
Implemented a feature that's so awesome, it makes unicorns jealous.
Replaced all semicolons with jazz hands; code execution is now much more expressive.
Fixed a bug where our program would randomly start singing 'Never Gonna Give You Up' by Rick Astley. We're not sure how it got there in the first place.
Refactored code to be as efficient as a caffeinated squirrel.
Replaced all instances of 'bug' with 'uninvited feature'.
